channel.title: Can't kill bug
channel.description:
Hi there,
I have found a bug in game. I can't kill anything in game:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-0lS8b5gStQ[/url]
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20XQ7n4UCOo[/url]
Does someone know the solution to this bug.
Thank you in advance and best regards,
Miha

item.title: Can't kill bug
item.description:
They are moving and the problem is that they kill the scientist that has to open a security door for me. And I cant kill them and stop them so I cant continue with the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't kill bug
item.dc:creator: KiLlEr
item.description:
they are not even moving so why would you bother to kill them? It looks like you disabled npc’s.
Or is the problem somewhere else?

Read full topic
